name: Queen's Quadrille
description:
Single-player chess variants. No teams, no takes, no checks. The only rule is to use legal chess movements.

Two game modes:

- Queen's Quadrille: Get the queen to visit all the marked squares.

- Hippodrome: Get all the knights from the bottom rank to the top rank.

You can use the Board ID to share challenging game setups with your friends.
